import React from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; const VerificationPending = () => { const { user, logout } = useAuth(); return (

Verification Pending

Your account is pending verification by an administrator.

Account Status

Your voter registration is under review. You will be notified once your account is verified.

{user && (

Voter ID: {user.voterId || 'N/A'}

)}
); }; export default VerificationPending;
